name: Magic Towers Solitaire
description:
Our incredibly popular Magic Towers Solitaire has come to Mac! Played hundreds of millions of times, iPhone and iPad players can attest to how enjoyable our game is. We combine a smooth card game experience with a beautiful and relaxing setting.

Use your skill and intelligence to fill the realm with magical towers and castles in this well-loved card game. Originally released as an online card game, our version of TriPeaks solitaire has grown and grown, and is now available to all you Mac players.

To win a round all you have to do is remove all three peaks (or pyramids) by matching cards that are one or higher or lower than your current card. You don't even need to match them by their suits! And if you can't make a move, simply turn over a card from the deck. Win as many rounds as you can to get highest score.

Here are some of the emails and reviews we have received about our card game:

"This is my go-to game! I've been playing it for years and I love it. I recommend it to anyone who wants a challenge."

"I absolutely love solitaire games, and I've been playing this one for a few years now. This version is more fluid than previous ones and provides a much more enjoyable experience as a result!"

"I like how it's different to Klondike Solitaire. The whole family competes for high scores."

FEATURES:

- A relaxing game for your brain inspired by the popular tri-peaks, a classic solitaire.
- Enchanting graphics set in a fantastical realm.
- Simple controls and smooth gameplay.
- High score leader boards so you can play with friends and family.
- Atmospheric sound effects.
- Interruption friendly with auto-save and resume. So you are free to play whenever time and allows.

This is a relaxing card game for anyone who has enjoyed playing a card game including classics like Spider and Windows Solitaire. It’s also available on mobile devices, ready for you to take and play anywhere. We trust you will enjoy playing and relaxing with Magic Towers Solitaire!
